markdownRemark.html:
Metaphorically speaking, the true function of a builder is to peel the onion. The most useful yet underutilized tool for any builder.

Suppose, you are in charge of owning a product development for a customer, what is the first thing you do? You don't just start building. You gather information on your customer. You do discovery. You understand their pain point. Customer want to make progress in their lives with the products they use. They do not care (to a certain extent) about the name, people who built it or fancy designs. Customer want to eat better, sleep better, take care of their families, be happy and feel recognized.

Asking questions.
